item.title: Setting Up a Scala Project With Sbt
item.description: How do you start your brand new Scala projects with sbt? Here’s what I do: mkdir my-project && cd $_ git init echo '.bsp/ .idea/ target/' > .gitignore mkdir -p src/{main,test}/{scala,resources} project echo 'sbt.version=1.6.2' > ./project/build.properties echo 'name := "MyProject" version := "0.
